hero.tagline: Bringing your ideas from the physical to the digital world.
hero.description: Specializing in photogrammetry-based 3D scanning and high-quality 3D printing.

list.title: 3D Scanning
list.description: Precise photogrammetry scanning using Poly.cam to create detailed digital models.
list.detailedDescription: Our photogrammetry-based 3D scanning service creates highly detailed digital replicas of physical objects. Using advanced Poly.cam technology and high-resolution cameras, we capture every nuance of your items with precision.
benefits: Highly detailed models suitable for various applications
Quick turnaround compared to manual modeling
list.processSummary: We capture hundreds of photos of your object from various angles, process them through specialized software, and deliver a clean, optimized 3D model ready for printing or digital use.

list.title: 3D Modeling
list.description: Professional 3D model creation and optimization, including mesh cleaning and preparation for printing.
list.detailedDescription: Our 3D modeling services transform concepts into detailed digital models. Whether starting from scratch or enhancing scan data, we create precision models optimized for your specific application.
benefits: Models optimized for specific use cases
list.processSummary: We work with your specifications to create detailed 3D models, carefully optimizing meshes, adding textures, and ensuring they're ready for printing or digital applications.

list.title: 3D Printing
list.description: Precise FDM and resin printing services for prototypes, models, and production parts.
list.detailedDescription: We offer both FDM (Fused Deposition Modeling) and resin-based 3D printing services. FDM provides durable, functional parts while our resin printing delivers extraordinary detail for smaller objects.
benefits: Complex geometries not possible with traditional manufacturing
list.processSummary: We prepare your 3D model for printing, select the appropriate technology and material for your needs, and carefully print your object with optimal settings for quality and durability.

list.title: Post-Processing
list.description: Comprehensive finishing services including support removal, sanding, and surface treatment.
list.detailedDescription: Our post-processing services transform raw 3D prints into refined final products. We carefully remove support structures, smooth surfaces, and apply necessary treatments to enhance functionality and appearance.
benefits: Preparation for further finishing or use
list.processSummary: We meticulously remove support structures, sand and smooth surfaces, and apply specialized treatments to achieve the desired finish quality for your 3D printed objects.

list.title: Custom Finishing
list.description: Professional painting and surface finishing to meet your specific requirements.
list.detailedDescription: Our custom finishing services elevate 3D printed objects with professional-grade painting, coating, and decorative applications that transform basic prints into showcase-worthy pieces.
applications: Functional parts requiring specific surface properties
list.processSummary: We prime, paint, and finish your 3D printed objects using professional techniques and materials to achieve your desired aesthetic and functional requirements.

list.question: What file formats do you accept/provide?
list.answer: We typically work with .STL, .OBJ, and .PLY files, but can discuss other formats if needed. We primarily deliver optimized .STL files ready for printing.

list.question: What is the turnaround time?
list.answer: Turnaround depends on the project complexity, object size, and required print time. Simple scans and prints can take a few days, while larger projects might take a week or more. We provide an estimate upon project review.

list.question: What materials can you print with?
list.answer: We offer a range of FDM plastics like PLA, PETG, and ABS for durable parts, and standard resins for high-detail models. If you have specific material requirements (e.g., flexible, heat-resistant), let us know, and we can discuss options.

list.question: Can you scan large objects or spaces?
list.answer: Yes, photogrammetry is versatile. We can scan objects ranging from small figurines to larger items like furniture. Scanning larger areas like rooms or building facades is possible but depends on the project scope and required detail level.

list.question: What is the accuracy of your scans and prints?
list.answer: Photogrammetry scanning accuracy depends on the object size and texture, typically within a millimeter range. FDM printing accuracy is usually around +/- 0.2mm, while resin printing offers higher precision, often below 0.1mm layer heights.
